description: Retrieves the resource-based policy attached to a private CA. If either the private CA resource or the policy cannot be found, this action returns a ResourceNotFoundException. The policy can be attached or updated with PutPolicy and removed with DeletePolicy.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the private CA that will have its policy retrieved. You can find the CA's ARN by calling the ListCertificateAuthorities action.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The policy attached to the private CA as a JSON document.
